Subfamilies of this metaphor family

Action is Motion metaphors

Number of Metaphors: 23

MetaphorDescriptionTarget FrameSource Frame
ABILITY TO ACT IS ABILITY TO MOVEAbility to actAbility to move
ACHIEVING A PURPOSE IS REACHING A DESTINATIONDEMO.Purposeful actionSelf propelled motion to a destination
ACTION IS MOTIONActionMotion
ACTION IS MOTION ALONG A PATHActionMotion along a path
ACTION IS SELF-PROPELLED MOTION ALONG A PATHActionSelf propelled motion
AIDS TO ACHIEVING A PURPOSE ARE AIDS TO REACHING A DESTINATIONAids to actionAids to motion
AMOUNT OF PROGRESS IS AMOUNT OF DISTANCE MOVEDPurposeful actionMotion to a destination
CAUSED INABILITY TO ACT IS PREVENTION OF MOTION ALONG A PATHActionMotion along a path
CAUSES ARE FORCESCausationForce
DIFFERENT MEANS OF ACHIEVING A PURPOSE ARE DIFFERENT PATHS TO A DESTINATIONPurposeful actionSelf propelled motion to a destination
DIFFICULTIES ARE IMPEDIMENTS TO MOVEMENTDifficulties in actionMotion impediments
DIFFICULTIES IN ACTION ARE PHYSICAL BURDENSDifficulties in actionBurden
EASE OF ACTION IS EASE OF MOTION ALONG A PATHActionMotion along a path
END OF AN ACTION IS THE END OF A PATHActionMotion to a location
FREEDOM OF ACTION IS THE LACK OF IMPEDIMENTS TO MOVEMENTFreedom of actionPhysical impediments to motion
GUIDED ACTION IS GUIDED MOTION ALONG A PATHActionGuided motion
IMPEDIMENTS TO ACTION ARE PHYSICAL IMPEDIMENTS TO MOTIONDifficulties in actionMotion impediments
INCREASE EASE OF ACTION IS INCREASE EASE OF MOTIONautoimportIncrease ease of actionIncrease ease of motion
MANNER OF ACTION IS MANNER OF MOVEMENTActionSelf propelled motion
MEANS ARE PATHSPurposeful actionSelf propelled motion to a destination
